Saying nothing, Dread took the drive and flew out to the Black 
Fortress.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Proudwing500k@h... wrote:
> Tyrael waited for Deathstar to come out of CR and reveal his new 
> self. Meanwhile, he had been working on a program to coordinate the 
> defenses of all three bases.
> 
> Tyrael: Dreadplague, report to the labs. I have an assignment for 
you.
> 
> Dreadplague reported a few nanocycles afterwards, weary from the 
> first encounter with the minions.
> 
> Tyrael: Daughter, it has begun. Darkangel is assisting the Maximals 
> against the minions of Unicron -because it is him behind all this- 
> and time is running out. I need you to bring this datadrive to 
> Hydras, and to ask him to send one of his men. Come back here when 
> you are done, with the Predacon, if possible.
